preqs: ECC4650 and ECC3690, or ECF5410 or equivalent

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ECC3690, ECC4650} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} OR  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECF5410})
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1}
Unit was previously coded {ECC4690%, ECO4690, ECO5840}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ECC3690, ECC4650} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1, 09-4}
Unit was previously coded {ECC4690%, ECO4690, ECO5840}

description: Topics include the gains and costs of trading internationally; static and dynamic welfare effects of protection; the political economy of international trade policy; optimum policies in the presence of market power, uncertainty, and other market imperfections; trade policy instruments; strategies for trade liberalisation including regional trade agreements.
